Using DataFrame.drop() to Drop Rows with Condition drop() method takes several params that help you to delete rows from DataFrame by checking condition. When condition expression satisfies it returns True which actually removes the rows.
df.drop(df[df['Fee'] >= 24000].index, inplace = True) print(df) Python Yields below output.
